title: Share of U.S. travelers who have had items stolen or lost 2015
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Smartphone and lowest at Response Passport.
The highest Response Smartphone has 6.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Passport.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Smartphone has the highest Share of respondents and Passport has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.

max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Smartphone has the highest Share of respondents and Passport has the lowest Share of respondents.
Second maximum Share of respondents is found at Response Credit card.
The highest Response Smartphone has 6.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Passport.
Response Smartphone is higher than any other Responses with value 10.0, followed by Credit card, and Debit card. Down to Response Passport with the lowest value 4.0.
The Response Smartphone tends to be 1.35 percent higher than average.
